title: Motion Pictures produced by Lubin Manufacturing Company, 1904-1909
brief_description:
Compilation of silent motion pictures produced by Lubin Manufacturing Company (Philadelphia).
Contents: Bold bank robbery (1904)—She would be an actress (1904)—Drunkard’s child (1909)—An Unexpected guest (1909)
Films restored from the Library of Congress paper prints.
